text: braqhmaqvAqdinO# vadantyaqdBir.-haqvI(gm)Shiq praukShIqH kEnAqpa itiq brahmaqNEti# brUyAdaqdBi-rhyE#va haqvI(gm)Shi# prOqkShatiq brahma#NAq&pa iqddhmAbaqrq.hiH prOkSha#tiq mEddhya#mEqvaina#t karOtiq vEdiqM prOkSha#tyRuqkShA vA qShA&lOqmakA#&mEqddhyA yad-vEdiqrmEddhyA#-mEqvainA$M karOti diqvE tvAq&ntari#kShAya tvA pRuthiqvyai tvEti# baqraq.hirAqsAdyaq prO - [  ]  24
